trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Campbell
There were no other sightings in Campbell on or around October 10th 2000
divs: Sighting DetailsMy son and I were in the back yard of our rental home in Campbell Ca.95008 Olympia Avenue October 2000 approximately 12:30 am. We had a fire pit with a fire in the back yard. My son said to me dad look up. As I did I noticed that just at the top of the tree the sky was blocked above us. A flesh colored object above us blocked the night sky. The texture of the base of the object looked like powder coating or an orange skin���a flesh color. The bottom also was channeled. The object moved forward towards the front yard at about 3-5 miles hr. We ran through the house yelling to my wife to wake up a UFO was over the house. My son and I stopped at the front of the side walk and street. My son was under the front and I about five feet to the right of the front facing NE. There is more to this event, please contact me.
Summary: Two UFOs seen hovering over us, then disappeared into a worm hole
